April 8, 1912 D Redhill Contest (Second Section)
Redhill Contest (Second Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
redhill-contest-second-section
None
Well of Love
Wiggie Lane Gardens, Redhill, Surrey 1st prize £6.15s. and shield, 2nd prize £4.15s., 3rd prize £3.5s., 4th prize £2.5s. March contest 1st (£1) Caterham United, 2nd (15s.) Fleet Town, 3rd (10s.) Redhill Men's Own. Medal for best flugal to Fleet Town. Medal for best side drummer to Redhill Men's Own. 5 bands competed.
April 28, 2012, 8:43 a.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 12:02 p.m.
1 Reading Spring Gardens Brass Band J. Hodges
2 Caterham Charles Hunt
3 Fleet J. A. Ritchie
4 Redhill Men's Own Walter Bashford
5 Crowborough Silver Unknown
